S

setDefaultCharset(Charset) - Static method in class com.github.powerlibraries.io.IOConfig
This method sets the default Charset that is used by all In and OutBuilders.
setDefaultCharset(String) - Static method in class com.github.powerlibraries.io.IOConfig
This method sets the default Charset that is used by all In and OutBuilders by calling Charset.forName(String) on the given name.
Source - Interface in com.github.powerlibraries.io.builder.sources
This class represents a source.
source(Source) - Static method in interface com.github.powerlibraries.io.In
This creates an input of any kind from a Source.
stream(InputStream) - Static method in interface com.github.powerlibraries.io.In
This creates an input of any kind from an InputStream.
stream(OutputStream) - Static method in interface com.github.powerlibraries.io.Out
This creates an ouput of any kind to an OutputStream.
streamLines() - Method in class com.github.powerlibraries.io.builder.InBuilder
This method reads the complete input in a Stream of Strings.
string(String) - Static method in interface com.github.powerlibraries.io.In
This creates an input of any kind from a String.
string(String, Charset) - Static method in interface com.github.powerlibraries.io.In
This creates an input of any kind from a String.
StringSource - Class in com.github.powerlibraries.io.builder.sources
This class represents a source that is a String.
